projects: [{"title":"\"Consumer Preference Towards Electronic Vehicles Market In India\"","start_date":"Oct 2021","end_date":"Apr 2022","description":"Due to growing urbanization and the increase in vehicles, most Indian cities endure traffic congestion and significant air pollution. As a result, alternate technology in autos, such as electric vehicles, may become necessary (EV).This study aims to identify consumer preferences toward electric vehicles in the Indian market. This research conducted a survey and analyzed the opinions of people regarding their preferences for electric vehicles, demographics, and some of the demotivation which might be stopping them to switch to electric vehicles altogether. This research will help in determining different factors influencing the perception of consumers toward electric vehicles and what they expect when they think about purchasing a new electric vehicle."},{},{"title":"Virtual Joint Student Project","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"Interviewed business managers of Indian and US firms on their contribution towards SDGâ€™sâ€¢ Project completed successfully by interviewing Mr. Sanvar Oberoi (Ex- Co-founder of BOHECO) & Mr. David Koerner (VP Marketing of 75 F). â€¢ Both the stories got published on the Aim2Flourish Website (A United Nations SDGâ€™s Partnership Platform)"},{},{},{}]
